text: mn almuminin rijal 'awfuu bieuhudihim mae allah teala, wasabaruu ealaa albasa' waldaraa' wahin albas: faminhum man waffa bndhrh, fastshhd fi sabil allh, 'aw maat ealaa alsidq walwfa', waminhum man yantazir 'ihda alhsnyyn: alnasr 'aw alshhadt, wama ghyaru eahid allh, wala nqdwh wala bddalwh, kama ghyar almnafqwn
